title: 新的MCPE的开发者加入Mojang
txt_content:
GU~QTMC3Z9O%HJ$KNH{GSI8.png (11.76 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2015-3-21 19:03 上传





Jeb:Belated announcement! Since 3 weeks we have a new MC:PE developer, Tomas Alaeus! Will focus on PE Realms :) #ff @talaeusJeb:迟来的通告！三周前一名MC:PE的开发者加入我们，Tomas Alaeus（托马斯.阿劳尔斯）！他将致力于PE的领域。

replies.author: GTVZDH123
replies.txt_content: MCPE将会是下一个璀璨的游戏大作
